transcript.text: Operator: Good day everyone. CEO: We are pleased to report strong growth. We expect full year revenue to be between $500M and $520M. Our margins are improving to 25%.

segments.speaker: CEO
segments.text: We expect full year revenue to be between $500M and $520M.

filings.content: Item 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On October 15, 2024, ACME Corp announced expectations of full year revenue of $500-520 million.
